Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: it wasn't a human, so they didn't really know exactly what to give feedback on and what feedback would be helpful to me

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: i had to tell AI to give me constructive feedback, otherwise they would tell me that everything was perfect.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: my teacher gave me more feedback that was related to the task whereas AI gave me more broad feedback that could relate to other things.
